duties_responsibilities.duty: Brainstorm and produce articles and interactive content under tight deadlines.
Schedule and write social media posts to increase digital traffic.
Engage with users to answer comments and address inquiries.
Work with Digital Content Manager to maintain the integrity of websites.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Measure and report on the performance of digital content to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience in Broadcasting, Digital Broadcasting, or related field.
